text: Jo Nam-jin is a North Korean military officer. ==Biography== He is known to serve as the deputy director of the KPA General Political Department and head of the Organization Department of the Korean People's Army.Kim Jong Un Observes and Guides Large Live Fire Combined Forces Exercise He holds the rank of Colonel-General. He was a member of the funeral committee of Kim Yong-chun and of Kim Yang-gon. ==References== Category:North Korean generals Category:Workers' Party of Korea politicians
title: Jo Nam-jin
